name: Spider Run (itch) (Guaraná Studio, Camila Borges, Rafhael7)
name_original: Spider Run (itch) (Guaraná Studio, Camila Borges, Rafhael7)
description:
Game made in 3 days for the game jam: Mini Jam 123: Web

Controls:

  • Move: WASD
  • Jump: Space
  • Dash: Left Shift
  • Pass Dialogue: Enter

Dash to kill enemies.
